title: GameStop, CVS Health, Rent the Runway, DWAC: What to Watch in the Stock Market Today
sub_head: GameStop shares slipped after it reported a wider loss; Rent the Runway fell on costs related to its IPO
body:
Stock futures are down after new restrictions were laid out in the U.K. to combat the spread of the Omicron variant. Here’s what we’re watching in Thursday’s trading:
Write to Joe Wallace at joe.wallace@wsj.com
